author: ccalcf
title: Room was too suffocated, roughest bed sheets
text:
I was given Room 7020 and it was extremely suffocating. I set the cool to the lowest with highest fan setting. There was little if any feel of cool air. Trying to Change room and was informed there were no vacant room available.
Opening the room windows did not help.
Trying to sleep became another nightmare , there were new cream colored sheets and towels being used at the hotel now however the towels do not absorb water and the bed sheets were so rough it was impossible to sleep well.
There was no privacy door knob holders when I asked the housekeepers she said there was no stock .
When I was having my breakfast someone came into my room.
After having some hot frothed milk with my coffee, i was unwell the whole day.
The next day I had black coffee and I was fine
